Description:
SOLD BY ARVIN SINGH 0402 713 612 & KALLEY SINGH 0433 927 573
Build your dream home in Kalkallo!
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this block of vacant land approximately 512sqm (16*32) located in one of North's most sought after up and coming locations Kalkallo.
This block is titled and ready to build. This block of land offers everything you need. Kalkallo has proposed community centres, state primary and secondary schools, as well as tertiary institutions. Kalkallo is soon be home to a proposed major retail and Metropolitan Activity Centre - catering for everything a growing community needs. Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy.
This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD !! 4 buyers still looking !!
6 METRO AVENUE, KALKALLO
TEAM SKAD proudly presents this wonderful family home!
First home buyers or investors take advantage of this opportunity to secure this
fantastic brand new 4 bedroom house in the heart of Kalkallo Stockland Estate !
This exceptional property exudes sophisticated style from every angle. Attractive
appointments and clever design epitomize this luxury residence which reflects the
best of modern living.
Featuring open plan living zone and immaculate kitchen with Cesar stone benchtops,
900mm stainless steel appliances with dishwasher, double lock up garage with
remote control, 3 bedrooms built -in robes & 1master bedroom with walk in robes.
Situated in a very popular location within close proximity to all amenities.
Ideal for a first home, investment or retiree offering a blend, without compromising
space or comfort. Located in the heart of Kalkallo within the proximity of parks and 3
minutes' drive to donnybrook VLINE train station.
If you are investor rental estimate for this brand new property around $ 370 to $ 390
Per week .
TURN KEY HOUSE NOT A SINGLE DOLLAR TO SPEND!!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
21 Holbrook Crescent, Kalkalo
The Eleet Wyndham City & Sahil Kakar" are proud to present this premium 3 bed, 2 bath and double garage home.
This opportunity presents all the WOW factors unavailable in any volume build homes. This masterpiece delivers a customized free flowing plan providing all the comfort and space every first home owner or landlord desires for their tenants. This home sets a fine example of luxury and comfort living.
More spectacular features that sets this home apart:
** Refrigerated cooling for warm and stuffy days & heating for cold and harsh winters at low
energy cost
** Down lights all through the home
** Feature Lights to add beauty and ambiance to the kitchen, dinning and lounge space
** 900MM stainless steel appliances cook top, range hood, quality oven from WestingHouse &
Bosch dishwasher
** Quality floor laminate
** All room with en-suite.
** One Powder-room.
** Auto Double garage with inside and rear access
** L shaped kitchen with stone splash back
** Kitchen & TV Bulkheads
** Lift facade for a stunning entrance to the house
Nest or Invest with premium inclusions at economical cost.
Call Sahil Kakar on 0401 926 466 to arrange for an inspection as this tremendous opportunity wont last long.
$0.00 Stamp Duty & $10,000 FHOG for eligible first home buyers (Please check SRO's website for your eligibility)*

Description:
A perfect Family Starter...
Set in the Stunning Cloverton estate, amongst quality homes, beautiful parklands and treelined streets, this Great size family home may be just what you are looking for. Features on hand including master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, kitchen with stone benchtops as well as 900mm stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, walk in panty, Formal lounge to highlight just a few. Extras also including, ducted heating, split system cooling, spacious alfresco area perfect for all year round entertaining, double lock up garage with remote control and internal access, Low maintenance colourful gardens and not to mention a 4kw solar panel system (16 panels) to help keep the electricity prices down. This One should Not Be Missed, you will need to inspect to truly appreciate this family home
Cloverton is a landmark community in Melbourne's north that will revolutionise residential living in Victoria. Imagine life in a clever and progressive city with jobs, schools, transport and entertainment right on your doorstep and more than 80 hectares of conservation space for a healthy outdoor lifestyle. Well that's Cloverton. Find land or a house and land package to suit you at Cloverton.

Description:
Fully-Titled Corner Block in the Heart of Cloverton!
With parkland virtually across the road, this sizeable allotment (corner of Durant Circuit) presents an increasingly rare opportunity to build your brand-new dream home in a sought-after Cloverton neighbourhood.
Perfect proportions, the block itself is approximately 415 square metres in size (15m frontage x 28m depth) along with the additional advantage of uniform dimensions and minimal gradient.
Building in Cloverton, you'll also reap the rewards of the area's Green Star development
principles ensuring every property adheres to a 6-star energy standard - saving on your fuel
bills, minimizing your environmental footprint and creating a healthier environment for everyone in the community.
This premier location provides the added appeal of being close to the best of Cloverton's
masterplan amenities including the Merri Creek conservation area, a range of sports and
recreational facilities, retail and dining precincts, as well as future schools and the proposed Cloverton Station, plus easy access now to both Donnybrook Station and the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Spectacular Home
Could you be looking for extensive living yet also enjoy entertaining - then look no further. This stylish single level designer home is perfectly suited for those looking for location, comfort and quality.
The kitchen is complete with quality stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, adjoining meals area, bright open plan family room, master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, 3 other generous size bedrooms complemented BIRs and a luxurious bathroom equipped with a free standing bath.
Last but not the least, ample size backyard, with low maintenance gardens delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Don't delay, call now for an inspection.
Additional luxury highlights include:
Heating and refrigerated cooling throughout
Easy clean wooden flooring and tiling
Built in study alcove
Double remote garage
Alarm
Intercom
Landscaped garden

Set Negotiation: Monday 24th February at 6:00pm (Unless Sold Prior)
This well-presented family residence is perfect for the first home buyer, investor or those looking to make the most of lock and leave living. Offering three bedrooms including main with ensuite (double basin and oversize shower), it features an expansive open plan living zone anchored by a kitchen showcasing a 900 mm range and a very handy, family friendly breakfast bench. Set in easy care landscaped gardens, it's a short drive to the Hume Freeway and Donnybrook's station and shopping hub, and is ready to enjoy easy access to Kalkallo's proposed Town Centre, Primary School and Community Centre.
Ducted heating
Split system unit
Kitchen with quality appliances
Double garage with auto door
Carpet and robes to all be bedrooms
Engineered timber floors to open plan living

Description:
Titled & Ready To Build
Located in the Cloverton Estate this 392m2 approximately, land is an opportunity not to miss. Easy access to Hume Freeway, Donnybrook Rd and Donnybrook station makes commute to work easy.
Cloverton is set to become Victoria's largest master planned community.
Located 38kms approx from Melbourne's CBD, it will become a city of the future for Melbourne's North, with homes to suit every family and budget.
* No Easement
* Titled & ready to build
* Front 14m
* Depth 28m

Description:
Character And Charm With Modern Style
Found in a fantastic location in the popular Kalkallo Estate, this pristine home offers generous living space and a convenient lifestyle. Live life to the max, relish in quality family time and enjoy relaxing in this amazing completed home.
With modern facades and colour pallets that are matched to premium lots in estates within close proximity, this property is situated nearby existing lifestyle amenities which also maximizes it's leasing potential.
Outstanding construction with all square set in the main areas; this property features cleverly designed living spaces that provide the ultimate in family flexibility. An expansive open-plan family/dining area is complimented by a gourmet kitchen, complete with a dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Comprising of 4 stunning bedrooms, all complete with ample storage and a sparkling central bathroom. The large master bedroom features a generous custom walk-in-robe and an impressive ensuite.
Additional property features include the ultimate family security package with crimsafe doors, cameras and an alarm system; ducted heating/cooling, efficient LED lighting and a stone benchtop in the kitchen with waterfall feature all add to the appeal. Outside features a garden shed and beautifully manicured gardens.
Just a short drive to the Hume Freeway and Donnybrook's station and shopping hub, and is ready to enjoy easy access to Kalkallo's proposed Town Centre, Primary School and Community Centre.
***PHOTO IDENTIFICATION IS REQUIRED FOR ALL INSPECTIONS***
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information, but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
